content.event: AWS hands-on: running serverless Django with Zappa
content.description: Online hands-on workshop for local AWS community in the Baltics about serverless and running a basic Django app on AWS Lambda with Zappa.

content.event: Introduction to AWS SQS for Web Application Task Queue
content.description: Di Community Online Talk Kali ini 8 Juli 2020, Ridwan Fadjar Septian akan meberikan pengenalan mengenai AWS SQS, untuk antrian tugas di sebuah aplikasi web (Web Application Task Queue).

content.event: AWS Roadshow Virtual 2020 - 10 Serverless con AWS Lambda
content.description: Conocerás los aspectos principales del servicio AWS Lambda. Hablaremos sobre los principales beneficios del cómputo serverless en AWS. xCrearemos una función de cómputo basada en Node.JS. Explicar
content.organizer: AWS User Group Ciudad de México

content.event: In a Gist: Lambda and Serverless Functions - Part 2
content.description: How do you optimize your Lambda functions? How does monitoring work? How do I use it to talk to other AWS services to build more complex logic? How can I easily perform testing?

content.event: Save Time And Money With Serverless Applications Using Cloud Run
content.description: Dear Developers! Here’s your chance to save money and go for a cloud run with GDG!

content.event: Webinar: Debugging AWS Lambda Performance  Issues
content.description: Yan Cui, AWS Serverless Hero, and Avia Mor, Lumigo co-founder, will cover tackling Lambda performance issues, including collecting the right telemetry, identifying bottlenecks, and removing them.

content.event: Lightweight Serverless Cloud Functions with Java and Quarkus
content.description: In this low-slides, high-code, session, we’ll dive into how Java, with the Cloud Native optimized framework Quarkus, is an excellent platform for building Cloud Functions.

content.event: Best Practices for Running Serverless Code in AWS Lambda
content.description: Running serverless code in AWS Lambda is incredibly easy, you can deploy your code and have it live in just a couple minutes. But doing this in an effective and efficient way can be very challenging.

content.event: AWS: Serverless for Frontend Developers
content.description: In this follow-along Meetup, we'll explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and how its platform can be used to bring out a new type of full-stack-development in the cloud.

content.event: Best practices for using DynamoDB in Serverless Applications
content.description: In this talk, you'll learn why DynamoDB is such a great fit in serverless applications. Then, you'll learn how to get started with DynamoDB as well as some best practices for data modeling with Dynamo

content.event: Building Full stack Serverless App with Gunnar Grosch
content.description: This session is the second part of our Full Stack Serverless Series. This session will have more demo, code and less presentation.
content.organizer: Pune AWS and Cloud User Group

content.event: Networking for Azure Functions – it’s for Serverless devs too!
content.description: In this session, we will discuss approaches to integrate Functions with virtual network restricted Azure resources. We will discuss approaches for private site access and virtual network integration.

content.event: Building Event Streaming Applications with Serverless Kafka
content.description: Apache Kafka is a well-known technology from the on-premises world, that is gradually being adopted in the cloud.
content.organizer: Bangkok Apache Kafka® Meetup by Confluent

content.event: Heitor Lessa - Lambda Powertools, a vida, o universo e tudo mais
content.description: Teremos a honra de receber o grande Heitor Lessa para falar sobre boas práticas em desenvolvimento de aplicações Serverless com AWS Lambda Powertools, a vida, o universo e tudo mais!

content.event: Creating a Serverless REST API in AWS
content.description: Are you interested in learning more about creating a Serverless REST API in Amazon Web Services (AWS)? If so, David Garcia will be presenting at our July meetup.

content.event: Establishing a CI/CD pipeline using AWS and the Serverless Framework
content.description: Establishing a CI/CD pipeline using AWS and the Serverless framework can drastically accelerate your deployments, and help eliminate human error during deployments.

content.event: AWS Amplify Days
content.description: Register for a two day exploration of full stack cloud development with AWS Amplify, a set of tools and services to build secure, scalable cloud-powered mobile and web applications.

content.event: Virtual Serverless Hackathon
content.description: This is a hands-on event suitable for advanced developers, passionate beginners, and curious minds! Each meeting is focused on exploring a serverless technology by building a service with it.
content.organizer: λ# - All Things Serverless and AWS Lambda

content.event: Online Serverless Meetup, July Edition
content.description: To keep you going with your monthly fill of Serverless, we will be bringing you an online edition this month.

content.event: Serverless Singapore - July 2020 Online Meetup
content.description: Less is more with Serverless. Running a serverless app on Google App Engine, Firestore, and Cloud Storage.

content.event: Cloud Native Serverless Meetup
content.description: Kubernetes is the preferred orchestration engine to manage these micro-services and deploy stateless & stateful applications. But Developers love to get to prod fast and often turn to Serverless.

content.event: DynamoDB Special with Alex DeBrie
content.description: In this talk, you'll learn about DynamoDB and secondary indexes. Then, we'll walk through some strategies for using secondary indexes effectively in DynamoDB.

content.event: Creating a Serverless App Without Writing Any Code: Azure Logic Apps
content.description: What if we could create a serverless app without needing to write any code? In this session we’ll explore Azure Logic Apps and learn how to create serverless workflows without needing to write code!

content.event: Cloud Run: Overcoming the challenges of building & deploying Serverless apps
content.description: What would an application built on top of Cloud Run look like? Two demos will guide us through the building and deploying of an application to Cloud Run.

content.event: Event Bridge Deep Dive
content.description: In this session, you will learn more about EventBridge, a serverless event bus service that makes it easy to connect your applications with data from a variety of event sources.
content.organizer: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

content.event: AWS Serverless Workshop
content.description: Get hands-on experience with AWS and serverless applications in this workshop. You'll deploy a simple web application that enables users to vote for their favorite options for a set of questions.

content.event: Serverless Authentication with Amazon Cognito
content.description: In this session, we will see what all things Amazon Cognito can do and how to integrate the service into your existing or serverless application.

content.event: ServerlessDays Virtual
content.description: Second edition of ServerlessDays Virtual with a busload of great speakers and talks.

content.event: ServerlessDays Hamburg
content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.

content.event: Serverless Architecture Conference
content.description: We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
